4 Places maximum par commande Coldplay vient d'annoncer les premières dates 2017 de son A Head Full Of Dreams Tour. Le 8 juin 2017 et le 15 juillet 2017, Coldplay nous fera honneur et l'immense plaisir de se produire à Lyon au Stade Olympique Lyonnais et à Paris au Stade de France pour deux concerts exceptionnels ! Depuis le mois de mars dernier, la tournée A Head Full Of Dreams Tour a comblé le public à travers l’Amérique Latine, les États-Unis et l’Europe, avec notamment quatre dates historiques dans un Wembley Stadium de Londres à guichets fermés. Plus de 2,5 millions de spectateurs ont déjà assisté à ce show unique conçu par le groupe avec le concours des célèbres producteurs designers Misty Buckley et Paul Normandale. L’album A Head Full Of Dreams s’est vendu à plus de 4 millions d’exemplaires depuis sa sortie en décembre 2015, porté par les hits Adventure Of a Lifetime, Hymn For The Weekend et Up&Up, totalisant plus d’un milliard de vues sur Youtube. Un quatrième single issu de l’album, vient juste de sortir. La semaine dernière, le groupe a été nominé pour 4 awards aux MTV EMA, dont le prestigieux award du meilleur live. Personnes à mobilité réduite : billetteriehandi@ol.fr

Coldplay come to Vienna 2017: concert at the Ernst Happel StadiumColdplay -A Head Full Of DreamsColdplay are a British rock band formed in 1996 by lead vocalist and pianist Chris Martin and lead guitarist Jonny Buckland at University College London (UCL). After they formed under the name Pectoralz, Guy Berryman joined the group as a bassist and they changed their name to Starfish. Will Champion joined as a drummer and backing vocalist, completing the performing line-up. Creative Director Phil Harvey is often referred to as the official fifth member by the band. The band renamed themselves `Coldplay` in 1998, before recording and releasing three EPs: Safety in 1998, Brothers & Sisters as a single in 1999, and The Blue Room in the same year. The Blue Room was their first release on a major label, after signing to ParlophoneVIP PACKAGE:Your VIP package includes, in addition to the best seating (sector B - 1st place), a buffet with cold and warm food in the VIP AREA before the concert. During the concert, drinks are served outside. There will be no break at the Coldplay concert, the VIP AREA will be reopened for about an hour after the concert in order to end the evening with a drink.
Coldplay - A Head Full of Dreams Tour
Coldplay - A Head Full of Dreams Tour

Please adhere to posted ticket limit. Any accounts or persons found to be in excess of ticket limit may have any or all of their orders canceled without notice by Ticketmaster in its discretion. There is a (4) four ticket limit for all presales combined, a (4) four ticket limit for VIP Packages, and an (8) ticket limit for public onsale. Front floor and sideline bowl seating will remain at a (4) ticket limit through public onsale. There are no refunds, exchanges, or upgrades for this event. All Ages need a ticket to enter the venue.

Coldplay have announced that they will play a special, one-off show at London’s Natural History Museum on November 25th to celebrate the release of their new album, Everyday Life (out November 22nd).
 
All proceeds from the show will go towards the work of ClientEarth, an environmental charity which uses the power of the law to protect the planet and its people.
 
Exclusive access for tickets will be given to UK fans who pre-order (or have already pre-ordered) Everyday Life from the Official Coldplay Store, before 23.59pm on Thursday, November 21st.
Please visit https://shop.coldplay.com/uk?ref= for more information.
 
Coldplay last performed in London in 2016. In June of that year, they sold out four nights at Wembley Stadium. This is expected to be the band’s only UK show of the Everyday Life era.
 
To prevent ticket reselling, the credit or debit card used to purchase tickets will be required to be presented by the lead booker upon arrival at the venue.
 
The band will mark the album’s release on Friday with Coldplay: Everyday Life – Live in Jordan, two exclusive performances streaming live on YouTube from Amman, Jordan on Friday, November 22. The concerts will mirror the two halves of the 52-minute double album: Sunrise and Sunset. The Sunrise concert will begin at 4am GMT, with the Sunset concert following at 2pm GMT.

venue.name: Global Goal: Unite for Our Future

description:
Coldplay, Damon Albarn, Haim, IDLES, Jorja Smith, Kano, Michael Kiwanuka, Wolf Alice, plus DJ Honey Dijon and other very special guests to perform from Glastonbury’s Worthy Farm for a spectacular livestream event. 
Having been forced to cancel the Festival for a second consecutive year, Glastonbury will host an exclusive global livestream from Worthy Farm on Saturday, 22nd May - for the first time in their history enabling music fans wherever they are in the world to join together and share the experience of the Festival and its idyllic natural surroundings. 
Filmed across the Festival’s Worthy Farm site at landmarks including the Pyramid Field and the Stone Circle, the event will see a range of artists giving their time to perform in support of the Festival, including Coldplay, Damon Albarn, Haim, IDLES, Jorja Smith, Kano, Michael Kiwanuka, Wolf Alice, plus DJ Honey Dijon who will all perform as part of an uninterrupted film production. There will also be a number of unannounced surprise performances.

All tickets, including accessible tickets, will be sold via artist presale. Details of which can be found through Coldplay’s store: https://ukstore.coldplay.com/ Companion ticket If you need a ticket for a companion, carer or personal assistant, please just let the venue know when you book. They offer one companion ticket, free of charge to provide the support needed and additional assistance during the course of an emergency evacuation and so you know, proof of eligibility will be required. Alternatively, if you have an Access Card please provide your full name and the card number. View the venue's full Essential Companion Policy here: https://academymusicgroup.com/o2shepherdsbushempire/content/academy-music-group-companion-policy

The first live performance of Coldplay’s brand-new album, Music Of The Spheres, from the Grand Opening of Climate Pledge Arena in Seattle. This is the band’s first arena show in nearly five years, just one week after their new album is released. Directed by Paul Dugdale.

Mobile barcodes can be viewed 72 hours prior to event.

Live Stream Presented by Amazon Music: https://music.amazon.com/live/events/LOXHRYSEQF
COLDPLAY LIVE FROM CLIMATE PLEDGE ARENA

Per current guidelines issued by the Calif. Dept. of Public Health (CDPH), the Venue requires all attendees of this event to receive a negative COVID-19 test within 72 hours prior to entering the venue, OR be fully vaccinated against COVID-19. By attending, you certify and attest that you and all individuals in your party will abide by the following regulations: All fans to provide printed proof of a negative COVID-19 test within 72 hours prior to entering the venue, OR be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 (at least 2 weeks after final dose) and provide printed documentation showing proof of immunization. Unvaccinated fans under 12 years of age will be required to take a COVID-19 test within 72 hours before the event and provide proof of negative test prior to entering the venue. Per CDPH, masks are mandated for unvaccinated individuals. Entry requirements subject to change. Check venue website for updates.

Music of the Spheres World Tour
Music of the Spheres World Tour

COLDPLAY ANUNCIA MUSIC OF THE SPHERES WORLD TOUR SE DEVELAN LAS FECHAS PARA EL 2022, JUNTO CON LA PROMESA DE HACER UNA GIRA SOSTENIBLE, BAJA EN CARBONO, TANTO COMO SEA POSIBLE Los conciertos en Mexico estarán a la venta al público en general el jueves 21 de octubre. La preventa exclusiva para tarjetahabientes Citibanamex inicia el martes 19 de octubre a las 11:00 am en el sistema Ticketmaster. En la víspera de su nuevo álbum, Music Of The Spheres, Coldplay anuncia hoy una gira mundial en estadios para el 2022. El Music Of The Spheres World Tour comienza el 18 de marzo de 2022 con el primer concierto de la banda en Costa Rica, antes de viajar a República Dominicana, Mexico, USA, Alemania, Polonia, Francia, Bélgica y el Reino Unido. La lista completa de los shows se encuentra más abajo y también en coldplay.com/tour. En la mayoría de los espectáculos estará H.E.R y en fechas seleccionas se contará con la presencia de London Grammar.

La preventa exclusiva para tarjetahabientes Citibanamex inicia el martes 19 de octubre a las 11:00 am en el sistema Ticketmaster. COLDPLAY ANUNCIA MUSIC OF THE SPHERES WORLD TOUR SE DEVELAN LAS FECHAS PARA EL 2022, JUNTO CON LA PROMESA DE HACER UNA GIRA SOSTENIBLE, BAJA EN CARBONO, TANTO COMO SEA POSIBLE Los conciertos en Mexico estarán a la venta al público en general el jueves 21 de octubre. La preventa exclusiva para tarjetahabientes Citibanamex inicia el martes 19 de octubre a las 11:00 am en el sistema Ticketmaster. En la víspera de su nuevo álbum, Music Of The Spheres, Coldplay anuncia hoy una gira mundial en estadios para el 2022. El Music Of The Spheres World Tour comienza el 18 de marzo de 2022 con el primer concierto de la banda en Costa Rica, antes de viajar a República Dominicana, Mexico, USA, Alemania, Polonia, Francia, Bélgica y el Reino Unido. La lista completa de los shows se encuentra más abajo y también en coldplay.com/tour. En la mayoría de los espectáculos estará H.E.R y en fechas seleccionas se contará con la presencia de London Grammar.

Los boletos para las nuevas fechas en CDMX y Guadalajara estarán en preventa para tarjetahabientes Citibanamex el lunes 28 de febrero y el martes 1º de marzo. La venta al público en general comenzará un día después en las taquillas del inmueble y a través de www.ticketmaster.com.mx Debido a la abrumadora demanda, Coldplay anuncia dos shows más en nuestro país como parte de su gira mundial MUSIC OF THE SPHERES WORLD TOUR 2022. La primera será el 30 de marzo en el Estadio Akron en Guadalajara y la segunda el 6 de abril en el Foro Sol de la Ciudad de México. La gira comenzará el 18 de marzo con el primer concierto de la banda en Costa Rica, antes de viajar a la República Dominicana, México, Estados Unidos, Alemania, Polonia, Francia, Bélgica, Reino Unido y Sudamérica. Debido a un imprevisto de programación, Carla Morrison reemplazará a H.E.R. en todas las fechas de Coldplay en México. DannyLux será el encargado del show de apertura. www.coldplay.com/tour.

COLDPLAY ANUNCIA MUSIC OF THE SPHERES WORLD TOUR En la víspera de su nuevo álbum, Music Of The Spheres, Coldplay anuncia hoy una gira mundial en estadios para el 2022. El Music Of The Spheres World Tour comienza el 18 de marzo de 2022 con el primer concierto de la banda en Costa Rica, antes de viajar a República Dominicana, Mexico, USA, Alemania, Polonia, Francia, Bélgica y el Reino UnidoLa lista completa de los shows se encuentra en coldplay.com/tour. En la mayoría de los espectáculos estará H.E.R y en fechas seleccionas se contará con la presencia de London Grammar. PLAN DE SOSTENIBILIDAD "A WORK IN PROGRESS", EL SHOW SERÁ ALIMENTADO POR ENERGÍA 100% RENOVABLE PROMETE REDUCIR LAS EMISIONES DEL TOUR EN UN 50%, UN ÁRBOL SERÁ PLANTADO POR CADA ENTRADA VENDIDA En 2019, Coldplay se comprometió a que en la medida de lo posible, sus futuras giras fueran lo más beneficiosas para el medio ambiente. Los detalles completos se pueden ver en coldplay.com/sustainability

How it works: - Fans can search for and purchase an Infinity Ticket HERE while supplies last. Note: Infinity tickets are non-transferrable, and must be bought in a pair. - Infinity Tickets can only be picked up on the day of the show at the Wembley Stadium box office with a purchase confirmation number along with a matching photo ID and the credit card used. - Fans receive their 2 tickets with their random seating assignment revealed. Note: The pair will be two tickets located next to each other. - Fans head into the venue and enjoy the show!

description: How it works: - Fans can search for and purchase an Infinity Ticket HERE, while supplies last. Note: Infinity Tickets are non-transferrable, and must be bought in a pair. - Infinity Tickets can only be picked up on the day of the show at the Manchester Etihad Stadium box office with a purchase confirmation number along with a matching photo ID and the credit card used - Fans receive their 2 tickets with their random seating assignment revealed Note: The pair will be two tickets located next to each other - Fans head into the venue and enjoy the show!

How it works: - Fans can search for and purchase an Infinity Ticket HERE, while supplies last. Note: Infinity Tickets are non-transferrable, and must be bought in a pair. - Infinity Tickets can only be picked up on the day of the show at the Manchester Etihad Stadium box office with a purchase confirmation number along with a matching photo ID and the credit card used - Fans receive their 2 tickets with their random seating assignment revealed Note: The pair will be two tickets located next to each other - Fans head into the venue and enjoy the show!

Please note: There is a delivery delay in place on all tickets purchased. Tickets will be viewable through the Ticketmaster app 72 hours prior to performance time. All field tickets are general admission, standing room only. There are NO seats on the floor. All general admission areas are first come, first serve. ALL SUPPORTING ARTISTS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE. There are no refunds or exchanges. Please adhere to posted ticket limits. If found to have purchased more than allotted amount, any or all tickets may be canceled without advanced notice. Please check LumenField.com for updated health & safety information as well as general stadium policies leading up to the performance date. Lumen Field is a fully cashless venue. The venue also adheres to the NFL Clear Bag Policy. Please check our website for further information
There is a Mobile ticket delivery delay in place on this event until September 24th 2023 at 6:30 PM.
